column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I have had coffee and pastries here. I do not come back for the coffee
column2: but I absolutely come back for the pastries. I got a vanilla latte
column3: which was good not great. However
column4: I love their baked goods. I haven't tried all of them (is this even possible?)
column5: but the ones I've tried I have loved. The oatmeal cream pies are a particular favorite of mine
column6: but the Nutella croissant is good too. Common Bond also serves a cooked breakfast
column7: but I have never had it.
